mapper.insert: insert into qna(qtitle, qcontent, mno) values(#{qtitle}, #{qcontent}, #{mno})
mapper.select: select qno, qtitle, u.mid, qwritedate from qna as q, userinfo as u where q.mno = u.mno and qno > 0 order by qno desc
mapper.update: update qna set qtitle = #{qtitle}, qcontent = #{qcontent}, qupdatedate = now() where qno = #{qno}
